### What Is the Difference Between Digital and Offset Printing?

#### Introduction
Choosing the right printing method is key for quality and cost-effectiveness. Digital and offset printing are the two most popular options for Shopify store owners. Here’s what you need to know to make the best choice for your next project.

---

#### Digital Printing
- Ideal for small runs and fast turnaround
- Lower setup costs; easy to customize each print
- Great for business cards, flyers, and personalized products

*Image Alt Text:* “Digital printer producing custom Shopify marketing materials”
**Image Suggestion:**
[Unsplash: Digital Printing](https://unsplash.com/photos/8manzosRGPE)

---

#### Offset Printing
- Best for large quantities and consistent color
- Higher setup costs, but cheaper per unit for big orders
- Perfect for catalogs, packaging, and bulk marketing materials

*Image Alt Text:* “Offset printing press in action for Shopify product packaging”
**Image Suggestion:**
[Unsplash: Offset Printing](https://unsplash.com/photos/3wylDrjxH-E)

---

#### How to Choose
- Use digital for short runs, personalization, and quick jobs
- Use offset for large orders, exact color matching, and specialty finishes
- Ask your print provider for samples before committing
